Get to know us & What we can offer

We offer courses in Science and Mathematics. Plus, enroll today and you will get a free T-shirt.

Learn More

Algebra, one of the broad parts of mathematics, together with number theory, geometry and analysis. In its most general form, algebra is the study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating these symbols; it is a unifying thread of almost all of mathematics.

Algebra Basics, here we explain how to solve basic equations by using addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Some examples can fractions.

Excellent Studying Facility

Academic Partner

NATIONAL INSTRUMENTS

Academic Channel Partner for S.T.E.M.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: sihan
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: sihan
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: sihan
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://baizonnlearning.click.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: sihan
item.content:encoded:
[smartslider3 slider="7"]

Nurturing a Love For Learning 

For over 5 years, we help students achieve success in school and in life by nurturing a love for learning.

From primary school to junior college, our students enjoy fun, interactive and relevant lessons and are empowered to think beyond the confines of the classroom.

Meet our staff and our message

Preparing Students To Achieve Success

Developing Confident and Successful Learners

Our students are at the centre of everything we do and their well-being and success in learning matter to us.

While we educate our students, we also equip them with the right knowledge, skills and attitudes that help them solve problems, think big and seek excellence.

Passionate Teachers That Make A Difference

Our teachers motivate and nurture every student to achieve their best and to build the right attitudes to ingrain a love for learning.

We hire teachers with the right passion and qualifications, and equip them to create amazing classroom experiences for their students.

We're committed to bringing out the best in every student.

Awards

Winner of Editor’s Choice Awards for 2016 Engineering Impact Awards ASEAN / ANZ Regional Contest

“A Smart Recirculating Aquaculture System”

Maps

[smartslider3 slider="8"]

MRT

Board the train on North-East Line and alight at NE13 Kovan Station, as indicated by the Blue dot .

Take Exit A and walk to “Seah Construction, 1007A Upper Serangoon Road”, as indicated by the Red Arrow ⤴.

(By-passing Simon Road, Florence Close, Florence Road)

Upon reaching the building, please use the staircase ® located by the side of the building to get to the 2nd floor where BAIZONN Learning Centre is located.

Bus

Alight at either bus stop located in-front or opposite of Glad Tidings Church, as indicated by the 2 Red Dots .

(Bus Services : 80, 81, 82, 101, 107, 112, 113, 119, 136, 153)

Upon reaching the building “Seah Construction, 1007A Upper Serangoon Road”, please use the staircase ® located by the side of the building to get to the 2nd floor where BAIZONN Learning Centre is located.

Car

Drive along Upper Serangoon Road towards Sengkang.

As indicated by the Red Arrow ⤴, turn left into Florence Road and turn right into carpark 5 located behind “Seah Construction, 1007A Upper Serangoon Road”,

Upon reaching the building, please use the staircase ® located by the side of the building to get to the 2nd floor where BAIZONN Learning Centre is located.

item.content:encoded:
The Future of Learning for you !

Baizonn Learning Center, founded in 2018, is dedicated to building a strong foundation for students through a focus on math and science principles. Their up-to-date curriculum and targeted lessons aim to prepare students for success in upcoming terms, equipping them to excel academically.

Home
About Us

item.title: Schedule
item.dc:creator: sihan
item.content:encoded:
Schedule

Timetable

Subjects Offering

Our Learning Center offers a diverse range of math and science subjects that cater to your learning needs.

From primary 3 to 6, to secondary 1 through 4, and junior college 1 and 2, we have it all covered.

We also offer advanced courses for IP and IB level math and science.

With flexible schedules and personalized attention, our Learning Center is the perfect place to unlock your potential and achieve your learning goals.

Enroll now and take the first step towards success!

Sign Up Now

Science

Mathematics

Advanced Courses

  • Integrated Programme (IP) Mathematics and Science
  • International Baccalaureate (IB) Mathematics and Science

item.title: Open House: Join us for a day of exploration and discovery!
item.dc:creator: user
item.content:encoded:
Open House for 2023 Intake 22nd December 2023, Friday 3pm to 9pm.

Bookings are essential. Could I please suggest that you make your booking as soon as possible so that you will not be disappointed?

Please contact us on the Center’s email or BaizonnLearning@gmail.com Or Phone Lum on +65 62811816

Christmas buffet dinner will be arranged for all guests. Vegetarian menu is available too. Kindly indicate your preference during booking. Unique Baizonn T-Shirt will be given free for all confirmed students during the Open House.

Schedule

item.title: Back-To-School Tips
item.dc:creator: user
item.content:encoded:
As the holiday season is coming to an end, the schools are re-opening. We encourage students to maintain a healthy lifestyle to keep up with the curiculum.
Here we have some tips for student of every age to maintain a healthy lifestyle:

  1. Set goals : Before the new session starts take time to set some new academic and personal goals. these will help you remain focused and motivated through the journey.
  2. Establish a routine: Discipline is the key in maintain the routine, set a time for each activity throughout the day you want to do and then follow it throughout.
  3. Ask for help : Building relationships and asking for help when needed it is important, feel free to talk to your guardian, parent, teacher or counsellor.
  4. Eat healthy : Eating healthy meals will help maintain energy levels throughout the day to help with tasks.
  5. Take breaks : Breaks help with rejuvenating the focus and recharge your mind to get back to the work.
  6. Stay positive : A positive mindset would be beneficial to overcome challenges and help in self motivation.

At our learning center, we promote a healthy and happy brain, so you can finally understand why the chicken crossed the road.

item.title: Maximizing Productivity: Tips for Staying Focused as a Student
item.dc:creator: user
item.content:encoded:
As students prepare for exams and other upcoming tests, we would like to encourage and motivate them to give it their best shot.
We would like to provide some tips to improve focus to help students in their journey…

  1. Get organized: Organizing your work and study environment while creating a schedule for you to follow to help you manage your time would be mindful.
  2. Eliminate distractions: Turn off your devices or anything else that might distract you while you study, make a quite and peaceful place to study.
  3. Take frequent breaks: Breaks can help in improving concentration as it helps in rejuvenating and recharging your brain.
  4. Exercise: Basic exercises can help in improving blood flow to the brain which will help in improving focus.
  5. Get enough sleep: Lack of sleep can affect the brain in a negative manner as it deteriorates its' cognitive abilities and overall capacity to concentrate. The recommended sleep is 7-8 hours per night.

Improving your concentration may take time and practice but these tips may help in maximizing the effect of your study strategy this exam period.

item.title: Welcome to Baizonn Learning Centre
item.dc:creator: user
item.content:encoded:
The Future of Learning For you!

Baizonn Learning Centre is a premier educational institution that has been dedicated to nurturing a love for learning in students for over 5 years. Our focus is on helping students achieve academic success and develop skills that will serve them well throughout their lives.

From primary school to junior college, our students benefit from fun, interactive, and relevant lessons that engage and inspire them. We believe that education should be enjoyable, and we work hard to create an environment that encourages curiosity, critical thinking, and creativity.

Our team of experienced and passionate educators are committed to empowering students to think beyond the confines of the classroom. Through personalized tutoring, group classes, and enrichment programs, we help our students develop a love for learning that will stay with them for years to come.

At Baizonn Learning Centre, we are passionate about education, and we are dedicated to helping our students achieve their full potential. Whether your child needs help with a specific subject or is looking to excel academically, we have the expertise and resources to help them succeed.
